item.title: Sources and Tracker have been moved to github
item.description:
Since I worked more and more with git and github, I decided to move Couchdbkit and Restkit to it:

  • couchdbkit
  • restkit

item.title: Build an external handler
item.description:
Building an external handler with couchdbkit is easy. The only thing you have to do is to create an object inheriting from `couchdbkit.external` module.

Here is a little snippet that shows you how to handle the example external process from CouchDB wiki with couchdbkit.

item.title: Formalchemy extension
item.description:
In the Django extension, I wrote the object `DocumentForm` that allows you to create a Django Form class based on a Document class or instance of a Document.

But you don’t need to use Django to have this facility in your web application. If you use Pylons you may already know FormAlchemy. FormAlchemy was originaly developped to map SQLAlchemy object in a form but it now contains an extension for Couchdbkit too.

item.title: Getting started
item.description:
This tutorial exposes key features of this library mainly through code
examples. For in-depth description of the modules, you’ll want to read
the API documentation.

If you have not installed couchdbkit yet, follow instructions on download page . Once you’ve done, you can write your first CouchDB document:

item.title: Storing design documents and views on the filesystem
item.description:
Couchdbkit allows you to manage you design docs and docs on the file system.

A system will be provided to manage view creation and other things. As some noticed, this system works like couchapp.

item.title: Couchdbkit version 0.4.2 released
item.description:
New release for Couchdbkit. More fixes

You can download latest release on Pypi or check download page for other ways.

item.title: Couchdbkit version 0.4 1 released
item.description:
New release for Couchdbkit. More fixes

You can download latest release on Pypi or check download page for other ways.

item.title: Couchdbkit version 0.4 released
item.description:
New release for Couchdbkit. More fixes and new `External` and _changes `Consumer`. The 0.4 branch is the last branch with suport for 0.9x / 0.10x versions of CouchDB. Next releases will support only 0.11/trunk and 1.0 versions and will support python3. The TODO has been updated.

You can download latest release on Pypi or check download page for other ways.

item.title: Couchdbkit version 0.3 released - pre-awesome
item.description:
New release for Couchdbkit. This release fix a lot of oddities from previous version and prepare for next version.

You can download latest release on Pypi or check download page for other ways.
